data.text:
NOTICE OF HEARING Pursuant to ...

NOTICE OF HEARING Pursuant to ...

NOTICE OF HEARING Pursuant to Indiana Code Â§ 20-26-7-37, the Board of School Trustees of Vigo County School Corporation gives notice that on August 12, 2024, at 6:00 p.m., they will meet in public session at the Administration Building Board Room, 501 West Olive Street, West Terre Haute, Indiana, to discuss and hear objections and support regarding the proposed renovation of and improvements to school facilities, including renovation and construction to create secure entrances at school facilities throughout the district and the purchase of equipment and technology. You are invited to attend and participate in the public hearing. Dated: August 1, 2024 /s/ Carey LaBella, Secretary, Board of School Trustees Vigo County School Corporation 303187-T/S-8/1-hspaxlp

NOTICE OF HEARING Pursuant to Indiana Code Â§ 20-26-7-37, the Board of School Trustees of Vigo County School Corporation gives notice that on August 12, 2024, at 6:00 p.m., they will meet in public session at the Administration Building Board Room, 501 West Olive Street, West Terre Haute, Indiana, to discuss and hear objections and support regarding the proposed renovation of and improvements to school facilities, including renovation and construction to create secure entrances at school facilities throughout the district and the purchase of equipment and technology. You are invited to attend and participate in the public hearing. Dated: August 1, 2024 /s/ Carey LaBella, Secretary, Board of School Trustees Vigo County School Corporation 303187-T/S-8/1-hspaxlp

Notice to Taxpayers of Additio...

Notice to Taxpayers of Additio...

Notice to Taxpayers of Additional Appropriations and/or Appropriation Reduction Notice is hereby given the taxpayers of Vermillion County, Indiana that the County Council of Vermillion County at a meeting in the Commissioners Courtroom, Courthouse, Newport, Indiana at 6:30 p.m., on the 12th day of August 2024, will consider the following additional appropriations and/or reductions in the budget for the current year. Additional Appropriation: Fund Name Amount 1000 General Fund$109,000.00 4912 Allocation Fund # 1$300,000.00 4913 Allocation Fund # 2 $96,370.00 Taxpayers appearing at the meeting shall have a right to be heard. The additional appropriations and or/reductions as finally made will be referred to the Department of Local Government Finance (DLGF). The DLGF will make a written determination as to the sufficiency of funds to support the appropriations and/or reductions made within fifteen (15) days of receipt of a Certified Copy of the action taken. Dated: August 3, 2024 Brenda Furry, Auditor 303280-T/S-8/3/2024-hspaxlp

The additional appropriations and or/reductions as finally made will be referred to the Department of Local Government Finance (DLGF). Dated: August 3, 2024 Brenda Furry, Auditor 303280-T/S-8/3/2024-hspaxlp

STATE OF INDIANA VIGO SUPERIOR COURT 2024 TERM CAUSE NO: 84D01-2407-ES-004547 IN THE MATTER OF THE SUPERVISED ESTATE OF GERALD ORNDORFF, DECEASED. NOTICE OF ADMINISTRATION Notice is hereby given that on the 10th day of July, 2024, Shirley Mills was appointed personal representative of the estate of Gerald Orndorff, deceased, who died on the 9th day of May, 2024. All persons who have claims against this estate, whether or not now due, must file the claim in the office of the Clerk of the Court within three (3) months from the date of the first publication of this notice, or within nine (9) months after the decedent's death, whichever is earlier, or the claims will be forever barred. /s/ Bradley M. Newman Clerk of the Vigo Superior Court Vigo County, Indiana Mark D. Hassler Attorney No. 8102-84 Hassler Kondras Miller LLP 100 Cherry Street Terre Haute, IN 47807 (812) 232-9691 ATTORNEYS FOR PERSONAL REPRESENTATIVE 303093-T/S- 7/26, 8/2 -hspaxlp
